## ‚ö° Urgent Privacy Issues
If you believe there is a **security vulnerability** that could affect user data:
- Please mark this issue as **CONFIDENTIAL** in the title
- Consider using responsible disclosure practices
- We will prioritize and respond as quickly as possible
